reviewText: I had brought it before and had used it several times to teach valuable lessons.

I bought these for my kids. I was very impressed with the knowledge this young man exhibits and how he uses God's Word in these as well.  The Curriculum Edition (PDF) is so worth the money.  There's a "school" version and a "church" version. I loved it so much I printed both. My kids and I both are so happy with this purchase and would highly recommend.
